report.title: Estadistico Usuarios
report.sql: SELECT DESCRIPTION as TIPO, IF(ISNULL(ENERO),'0',ENERO) AS ENERO, IF(ISNULL(FEBRERO),'0',FEBRERO) AS FEBRERO, IF(ISNULL(MARZO),'0',MARZO) AS MARZO, IF(ISNULL(ABRIL),'0',ABRIL) AS ABRIL, IF(ISNULL(MAYO),'0',MAYO) AS MAYO, IF(ISNULL(JUNIO),'0',JUNIO) AS JUNIO, IF(ISNULL(JULIO),'0',JULIO) AS JULIO, IF(ISNULL(AGOSTO),'0',AGOSTO) AS AGOSTO, IF(ISNULL(SEPTIEMBRE),'0',SEPTIEMBRE) AS SEPTIEMBRE, IF(ISNULL(OCTUBRE),'0',OCTUBRE) AS OCTUBRE, IF(ISNULL(NOVIEMBRE),'0',NOVIEMBRE) AS NOVIEMBRE, IF(ISNULL(DICIEMBRE),'0',DICIEMBRE) AS DICIEMBRE, ENERO+FEBRERO+MARZO+ABRIL+MAYO+JUNIO+JULIO+AGOSTO+SEPTIEMBRE+OCTUBRE+NOVIEMBRE+DICIEMBRE AS TOTALES FROM mbr_classify_dm M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CLASSIFICATION,MAX(ENERO) AS ENERO,MAX(FEBRERO) AS FEBRERO,MAX(MARZO) AS MARZO,MAX(ABRIL) AS ABRIL, MAX(MAYO) AS MAYO,MAX(JUNIO) AS JUNIO,MAX(JULIO) AS JULIO,MAX(AGOSTO) AS AGOSTO,MAX(SEPTIEMBRE) AS SEPTIEMBRE, MAX(OCTUBRE) AS OCTUBRE,MAX(NOVIEMBRE) AS NOVIEMBRE,MAX(DICIEMBRE) AS DICIEMBRE FROM ( SELECT CLASSIFICATION, count(mbrid) AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '01' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, count(mbrid) AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '02' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, count(mbrid) AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '03' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, count(mbrid) AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '04' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, count(mbrid) AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '05' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, count(mbrid) AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '06' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, count(mbrid) AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '07' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, count(mbrid) AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '08' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, count(mbrid) AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '09' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, count(mbrid) AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '10' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, count(mbrid) AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '11' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, count(mbrid) AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '12' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION ) A GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION ) B ON B.CLASSIFICATION = M.CODE UNION SELECT 'Totales' as TIPO, SUM(ENERO), SUM(FEBRERO), SUM(MARZO), SUM(ABRIL), SUM(MAYO), SUM(JUNIO), SUM(JULIO), SUM(AGOSTO), SUM(SEPTIEMBRE), SUM(OCTUBRE), SUM(NOVIEMBRE), SUM(DICIEMBRE), SUM(TOTALES) FROM ( SELECT IF(ISNULL(ENERO),'0',ENERO) AS ENERO, IF(ISNULL(FEBRERO),'0',FEBRERO) AS FEBRERO, IF(ISNULL(MARZO),'0',MARZO) AS MARZO, IF(ISNULL(ABRIL),'0',ABRIL) AS ABRIL, IF(ISNULL(MAYO),'0',MAYO) AS MAYO, IF(ISNULL(JUNIO),'0',JUNIO) AS JUNIO, IF(ISNULL(JULIO),'0',JULIO) AS JULIO, IF(ISNULL(AGOSTO),'0',AGOSTO) AS AGOSTO, IF(ISNULL(SEPTIEMBRE),'0',SEPTIEMBRE) AS SEPTIEMBRE, IF(ISNULL(OCTUBRE),'0',OCTUBRE) AS OCTUBRE, IF(ISNULL(NOVIEMBRE),'0',NOVIEMBRE) AS NOVIEMBRE, IF(ISNULL(DICIEMBRE),'0',DICIEMBRE) AS DICIEMBRE, ENERO+FEBRERO+MARZO+ABRIL+MAYO+JUNIO+JULIO+AGOSTO+SEPTIEMBRE+OCTUBRE+NOVIEMBRE+DICIEMBRE AS TOTALES FROM mbr_classify_dm M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CLASSIFICATION,MAX(ENERO) AS ENERO,MAX(FEBRERO) AS FEBRERO,MAX(MARZO) AS MARZO,MAX(ABRIL) AS ABRIL, MAX(MAYO) AS MAYO,MAX(JUNIO) AS JUNIO,MAX(JULIO) AS JULIO,MAX(AGOSTO) AS AGOSTO,MAX(SEPTIEMBRE) AS SEPTIEMBRE, MAX(OCTUBRE) AS OCTUBRE,MAX(NOVIEMBRE) AS NOVIEMBRE,MAX(DICIEMBRE) AS DICIEMBRE FROM ( SELECT CLASSIFICATION, count(mbrid) AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '01' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, count(mbrid) AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '02' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, count(mbrid) AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '03' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, count(mbrid) AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '04' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, count(mbrid) AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '05' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, count(mbrid) AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '06' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, count(mbrid) AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '07' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, count(mbrid) AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '08' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, count(mbrid) AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '09' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, count(mbrid) AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '10' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, count(mbrid) AS NOVIEMBRE, 0 AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '11' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION UNION SELECT CLASSIFICATION, 0 AS ENERO, 0 AS FEBRERO, 0 AS MARZO, 0 AS ABRIL, 0 AS MAYO, 0 AS JUNIO, 0 AS JULIO, 0 AS AGOSTO, 0 AS SEPTIEMBRE, 0 AS OCTUBRE, 0 AS NOVIEMBRE, count(mbrid) AS DICIEMBRE FROM MEMBER WHERE date_format(create_dt,'%Y') = -1 and date_format(create_dt,'%m') = '12' GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION ) A GROUP BY CLASSIFICATION ) B ON B.CLASSIFICATION = M.CODE ) T
